long_description: From camping to celebrating, the retro Stanley Classic Flask has a slim profile, wide mouth and rugged exterior that make it a perfect accessory for any adventure, party or night by the fire. Stainless-steel interior does not retain flavors or smells; rustproof exterior withstands weather and wear. Wide-mouth opening is easy to sip and pour from. Slim profile slides into a pocket. Base can be engraved to add a few special words (engraving not available through REI). Integrated lanyard ensures you won't lose the cap. Closeout.
short_description: From camping to celebrating, the retro Stanley Classic Flask has a slim profile, wide mouth and rugged exterior that make it a perfect accessory for any adventure, party or night by the fire.
